mapper.select: select rs.id,rs.title,rs.desc,rs.cover,rs.type,rs.path, rs.category_id as categoryId, rs.create_time as createTIme, rs.update_time as updateTime from video rs where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update video set `title`=#{title}, status=#{status}, cover=#{cover}, path=#{path}, `type`=#{type}, `desc`=#{desc}, category_id=#{categoryId}, update_time=#{updateTime} where id=#{id}
